constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: The proposed unit would not meet the minimum floor to ceiling height of 2.5m set out in Policy D6 of the London Plan 2021. The proposal would therefore provide a substandard level of accommodation contrary to Policies DM10, DM13 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012  and Policy D6 of the London Plan 2021.

The proposed subdivision of the plot would create a new narrow plot and a reduction in the width of the donor plot that would give the appearance of a cramped form of development and create an incongruous feature that would be at odds with the prevailing pattern and form of development/layout of the surrounding area detracting from the character and appearance of the host property and the surrounding area. As such the proposal would not accord with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
description: Erection of two storey front extension to East wing of the house to create a self contained dwelling. Changes to fenestrations.
